name: M.A.D. Elf - Sanctimonious Murder Hobo: Rogue 26 / CoT 10 / Paladin 4
author: EasternPromises

posts.author: EasternPromises
posts.content:
Good morning ECB,

I have a fun combo for all of you, one that I designed to murder hobo away in mid to high magic settings. I have fighter AB, epic dodge, 14d6 sneak attack w/ crippling strikes, Paladin saves + evasion, divine might+shield, UMD, and 6 (7 w/ haste) attacks per round base. Load up with weapon enchantment / DP scrolls, throw up divine might, and surprise unsuspecting NPCs with the wrath of murder hobo.

Oh, you can also do lots of trap stuff.

posts.author: Thorsson
posts.content: How do you land the sneak attacks, i.e. how do you make opponents flat-footed?

posts.author: EasternPromises
posts.content: I have hide this time! UMD+Darkness/ultra. I have AB enough to actually knock people down as well. I guess that would encourage IKD then, which I would give up DS for. That means another level of CoT preepic and rogue 27.

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
Yup, drop DS (you already have good AC plus ED) and take IKD so you can generate lot's of sneaks consistently and never let'em get up.
Your AB can support this play-style.

Edit: Heck, since you min-maxed your stats already, I would even consider going Str(10)/Cha(16) for more duration/charges.

posts.author: EasternPromises
posts.content:
Divine might needs 13 str or I'd be a kukri halfling by now :)

I built this guy to punish Pale Masters and liches as well as crit vulnerable opponents.

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
Haha, I was surprised that you weren't in the first place, but I missed the PA(13,Str)
Need coffee!

CON: 8
WIS: 14 (16)
INT: 14
CHA: 14
 
With 13 cleric levels you should be able to cast lvl 7 spells. But then you need Wis 17.
The normal standard for "econo" clerics is to take 15 levels for the +5 to many buffs.

posts.author: EasternPromises
posts.content: Good catch Mick, thanks. The idea indeed is to buff every stat to cap. Taking a break from more serious building and enjoying some single player modules.
